name: Cats In Boxes (itch)
description:
*No cats were harmed in the making if this game* Game made for the 2019, 8bitstoinfinity "Revision jam", hosted by Joshua McLean.

Contains music ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International

Known bugs: Sometimes the 'highlighted area' for when placing a cat, doesn't dissapear during playtime
